attributes.action: introduce legislation to make it mandatory for every immigrant over the age of 16, regardless of country of origin, gender; religion; creed; colour or sexual orientation, to carry out 3 years of military service in the british forces as a condition of being allowed into the country, with their families being made to wait until the military service is fully completed before they are allowed in.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears that there is no disincentive to anybody to make them not want to come to this country.  A demonstration of their commitment and loyalty to their new homeland, in the form of conscripted military service, might just be what it takes!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
